reviewText: So dark, almost black, it is most of the time impossible to see what is on the screen. A very bad copy! Do not buy it.

Based on Antonio Tabucchi's work, this film is about a travel to Goa, and an inner travel of the protagonist in search of a portuguese friend, who maybe is himself. Accordind Pessoa, whose works were translated from portuguese into italian by Tabucchi, "living is not needed. Sink is needed". Anglade travels, and we with/within him too.
